# 🔥 This topic is rapidly gaining attention.


## Section 1
The Super refresh to Nvidia's RTX 50-series GPUs was expected at CES 2026 in January, but it didn't make an appearance. The Information reports that in December, Nvidia managers decided not to release the new cards as scheduled, choosing to prioritize AI chips instead due to the limited supply of RAM currently available. On top […] The Super refresh to Nvidia's GTX 1060 is expected to be released in February, with Nvidia executives stating that the new cards will be available for pre-order on February 26th. A lot of speculation has been going around regarding the GTX 1060 and its potential launch. The official announcement of the GTX 1060 on January 4th, 2015 by Nvidia's CEO Jen-Hsun Huang was that the company is "working on a new generation of the next generation of high-performance computing," which is "designed to deliver a new level of performance and productivity for consumers and businesses."

## Conclusion
The real impact of this shift depends on how responsibly and thoughtfully the technology is adopted.
